## About Defenestrate is a newly formed guild located on Tarren mill intent on maintaining a 2 day a week raiding guild while keeping up with irl at the same time. We are currently 4/9 Mythic. Our aim is cutting edge, to achieve this we will be raiding two days a week, Monday and Thursday.

Attendance

We prefer people to have as close to 100% attendance as possible for raids, however we understand that real life is always priority.

Loot Distribution

All loot is distributed, via a 3 man loot council, with all loot being awarded to the player able to most benefit from said loot.

We're currently recruiting talented players to join our ranks in preparation for Antorus, the burning throne. Please see our Contact Section for our current recruitment options.
